name: A.P.R.C: Our personal "You" (Demo)
description:
A short psychological thriller VN demo.

Part of the future A.P.R.C (A Post-Reality Chronicle) series.

"You and Lily have been inseparable childhood friends for almost a decade now, and close to graduation, could it be that love will fully blossom?

Although the answer can feel like yes, our protagonist, you, may have...doubts.

Not to mention, your personal issues aside, it seems a new A.I app has been getting awfully popular lately."

Credits:

Music: NojiSuma

Character Sprites:  MUGかぶり

Backgrounds: "Uncle Mugen", "houseofimagistudio" and "Vision_Renders"

Story: me I guess
